vsParam:
Bergamot Sensei,
what do you want [px] for?

Phew... Here, take this.
This is the result of the exam earlier.

Let me see it... Oh, that's a pretty high score?
Although I don't really understand it.

Yeah. That's a quite high score.
No.1 in the whole cohort.

Yeah.
I'll make an exception and reward you.

Uh, really!? That's wonderful, [px]!
So! What's the reward!?
VLOOKUP(テーブル6234[[#This Row],[引数2]],キャラID対応表!B$5:C$53,2,0)

So, today's lesson will be
conducted by [px].
Ho ho... Everyone, ask your questions.

"Being a sensei for one day"...
It doesn't feel like a reward at all...
Sensei, I am not quite clear with this part on the book!
Sensei, I am hungry, treat me after the class!

Um...
Do you have a girlfriend?

Um...
Do you have a boyfriend?

Good work, [px]...
Being a teacher is very tiring...

Ha ha ha, now you know how hard being a teacher is?
But... You worked quite hard.

Yeah...
But using this as a reward is not so nice, don't you think?

Humph, nonsense.
I just offered a possible career for [px].

[px], your have good grades and you are caring,
you think of others all the time.

a teacher in the Academy like me.

I see...
[px] is quite suitable to be a teacher!

I won't push you.
Just take this as an option for your future.

I wish to see you being a head teacher one day,
and I look forward to teaching with me.

Eh-hem, I said too much.
I gotta go, [px].

Hee hee, [px].
It seems that sensei holds a high expectation for [px].

Of course, [px] will be the one to choose
which path to take...

But, just like sensei said, being a teacher...
Might be pretty good.
